products.name: SafetyMax Pro Steel Toe
products.description: Professional grade safety shoes with steel toe cap and anti-slip sole

products.name: GW-S01
products.description:
Upper material: two-layer cowhide (except cow suede)
Sole material: polyurethane solid sole
Toe material: steel toe cap
Shoemaking process: injection molding process
Upper height: low top
Function: anti-smash, anti-puncture, wear-resistant, acid and alkali resistant
Application: construction industry, welding industry, machinery manufacturing, petroleum mining, auto repair industry, electronics i
